document_data.name: Karmak
document_data.mainbody: '''Karmak''' trees were a type of tree found growing in a few isolated groves in the [[Winto Forest]] in the [[Bashan Do Province]] of [[T'u Lung]].
document_data.Description: Karmaks were viewed as almost useless because their wood warped after curing and was heavy with an [[oil]]y sap. A key exception was their use in producing ''[[flame egg]]s''. The sap needed to be refined and distilled into a fine oil, with a more pure oil resulting in more effective ''eggs''.
